geometa 0.9
  • Reference

getISOCodelist

Source: R/ISOCodelist.R
getISOCodelist.Rd

getISOCodelist allows to get a registered ISO codelist by id registered in geometa

getISOCodelist(id)

Arguments

id

identifier of the codelist

Author

Emmanuel Blondel, emmanuel.blondel1@gmail.com

Examples

            
  getISOCodelist(id = "LanguageCode")
#> <ISOCodelist>
#> ....|-- id: LanguageCode
#> ....|-- refFile: ISO-639-2_utf-8.txt
#> ....|-- codeSpace: ISO 639-2
#> ....|-- identifier: LanguageCode
#> ....|-- description: Language : ISO 639-2 (3 characters)
